subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Shawn Green, the Mets’ starting right fielder, failed to catch a deep fly by Scott Spiezio on Friday night, and he failed to reach a fly ball down the right-field line by Spiezio on Saturday night.
snippet: Shawn Green, the Mets’ starting right fielder, failed to catch a deep fly by Scott Spiezio on Friday night, and he failed to reach a fly ball down the right-field line by Spiezio on Saturday night.
